briefTitle: Study of Cytochrome P450 Polymorphisms (CYP2D6, CYP3A4/5 and CYP2C19) in Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: Association Between Genetic Polymorphisms of CYP2D6 and Outcomes in Breast Cancer Patients With Tamoxifen Treatment
conditions: Breast Neoplasms, Survival Analysis, Antineoplastic Agents, Therapeutic Uses
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The frequency of the genetic polymorphisms of CYP2D6 in breast cancer patients
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* age ≥ 18 years
* Breast cancer patients who underwent surgery

Exclusion Criteria:

* None
